FuncDef: This command configures the maximum number of concurrent TWAMP-Test sessions across all allowed clients. A new test session (described by a Request-TW-Session message) is rejected if accepting it would cause either the limit defined by this command or a prefix limit (max-sess-prefix) to be exceeded.

ParaDef.Info: The maximum number of concurrent test sessions. Values-0 to 128. ParamDefault: Default- 32
